extends Game.GameObject
implements Camera.Renderable, Physics.Collidable

        public void setStart(int x,
                     int y)
        Sets the initial location for top left corner of sprite in pixels.
        Parameters:

        y - y coordinate in pixels

      • startMove

        public void startMove(java.lang.String direction)
        Sets actor movement flag to true for desired direction. Valid strings are: "up" "down" "left" "right"
        Parameters:
        direction - String representation of direction

      • stopMove

        public void stopMove(java.lang.String direction)
        Set movement flag for direction to false Valid directions: "up" "down" "left" "right"
        Parameters:
        direction - Direction of movement to turn off

      • isMoving

        public boolean isMoving()
        Boolean getter for the moving flag
        Returns:
        true if actor moving, false if not

      • isStopped

        public boolean isStopped()
        Boolean getter for the stopped flag Mainly used for pathing and ensuring that actor is not moving onto an unwalkable tile
        Returns:
        true if an unwalkable tile is found and the actor is stopped short
